Rushang Karia

Hello! I'm a Ph.D. student at Arizona State University studying Computer Science in the School of Computing, Informatics, and Decision Systems Engineering (CIDSE). I work in the Autonomous Agents and Intelligent Robots (AAIR) lab with Dr. Siddharth Srivastava as my advisor.

My research is concentrated in the fields of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Focus areas include:-

  • Automated Planning
  • Abstraction
  • Generalized Planning
  • Reinforcement Learning
Prior to my Ph.D., I worked as a Firmware Engineer at SanDisk (now Western Digital) from 2016-2019, where I was involved in the development of firmware for enterprise SSDs (solid state drives).

Still reading? Waow, umm thanks! To know more about me (including my love for memes), head over to the Bio (which is still under construction) or just send me a message at Rushang.Karia@asu.edu.
